Jan. 2, 1997§ 23 - Payment to widow or children of deceased member§ 23a - Payments to widow, widower or minor children; payment for disability§§ 24, 25 - Repealed. Act Jan. 4, 2000, No. 2, § 1, eff. Jan. 4, 2000§§ 26, 27 - Repealed. Act Dec. 20, 1977, No. 4, p. 611, § 8.036, eff. Dec. 20, 1977; renumbered as § 8.030 by Act Jan. 10, 1983, No. 3, p. 375, § 150, eff.
